name: Haris E. Psillakis
content: Haris E. Psillakis Homepage Haris E. Psillakis Assistant Professor Division of Signals, Controls and Robotics School of Electrical and Computer Engineering National Technical University of Athens (NTUA) Contact Information E-mail:  hpsilakis@central.ntua.gr Address:  National Technical University of Athens School of Electronic & Computer Engineering 73100 GR, Athens, Greece Research Interests Adaptive Control Nonlinear Control Intelligent Control Multi-Agent Systems Stochastic Systems Power Systems Robotics Uncalibrated Visual Servoing Education University of Patras Ph.D., Electrical & Computer Engineering, July 2006 University of Patras Diploma of Electrical & Computer Engineering,  March  2000 Publications Journal Papers D.
